articles.title: Americans Keep Spending: Holiday Sales Grew 3.4%
articles.description: A retail survey showed an 18.8 percent rise in online shopping. Consumer confidence has been bolstered this year by a low unemployment rate.
articles.content:
Americans keep spending, driving the economy at a time when unemployment is at a half-century low point despite headwinds from the trade war.
